message.raw:
* Changed shared drive in default config file to ~/labscript_shared on unix
* removed mise port from default config file
* Introduced app_saved_configs path in config file
* change runmanager and lyse autoload_config_file settings to use app_saved_configs
* made installer create default app_saved_configs folder in userlib.
message.html:
• Changed shared drive in default config file to ~/labscript_shared on unix
  • removed mise port from default config file
  • Introduced app_saved_configs path in config file
  • change runmanager and lyse autoload_config_file settings to use app_saved_configs
  • made installer create default app_saved_configs folder in userlib.
